title: Ping Spikes - Feels like constant frame loss
body: Anyone else getting constant lag / ping spikes that make it feel glitchy, even if it only fluctuates between 20-40 ping?

replies.body: Ok, there was just a small download on the client and I think it fixed it. I'm not sure if the patch was related to ping but now it's fine. Will update if any other issue.
having the same issue dude, not sure whats going on but its started since i patched
